alert.note: Alert for Potomac, Seeley Lake Region (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Missoula (Western Montana and Central Idaho)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 24 at 4:13AM MST until December 24 at 2:00PM MST by NWS Missoula
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 2 PM MST THIS AFTERNOON... ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 2 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 11 AM MST SUNDAY... * WHAT...For the Winter Storm Warning, heavy mixed precipitation expected. Total snow accumulations of 1 to 3 inches and ice accumulations of a tenth of an inch up to a quarter of an inch. For the Winter Weather Advisory, light snow this morning will gradually taper off. Additional snow accumulations of one to two inches. * WHERE...Highway 200 Bonner to Greenough, Highway 83 Seeley Lake to Condon, and I-90 East Missoula to Bearmouth. * WHEN...For the Winter Storm Warning, from 2 PM this afternoon to 11 AM MST Sunday. For the Winter Weather Advisory, until 2 PM MST this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Travel could be nearly impossible. Local power outages and tree damage are possible due to the ice.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
